ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe A Relativistic Electron Proton Telescope (REPT,)Electron Fluxes Summary Plots

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added ObservedRegion(s). Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Van Allen Probe A, Summary Plots of Electron fluxes measured by the Relativistic Electron Proton Telescope (REPT), which is one of three instruments on the Energetic Particle, Composition and Thermal Plasma Suite (ECT)

InformationURL.Name: ECT Science and Data Portal
InformationURL.Description: the RBSP-ECT data processing has been migrated from LANL to the New Mexico Consortium (NMC) which is a university-owned research institute affiliated with LANL

InformationURL.Name: The Van Allen Probes Home Page
InformationURL.Description: Science Gateway (including Mission Rules of the Road for Data Usage)

AccessURL.Name: The Van Allen Probes Science Gateway
